plus 3-weekly instillations at 3, 6 and 12 months), or instillations of chemotherapy (the optimal 
schedule is not known) for a maximum of one year is recommended. The final choice should 
reflect the individual patient’s risk of recurrence and progression as well as the efficacy and 
side effects of each treatment modality. Offer one immediate chemotherapy instillation to 
patients with small papillary recurrences detected more than one year after previous TURB.
